extendedInfo.description: Have you ever been entertaining guests at your house and playing the iPod on random shuffle? All of the sudden you hear: "Hi my name is Chris and I am a grateful Recovered Alcoholic!". Well that is exactly what happened in my house. So much for anonymity. So I decided to release AA Speakers To Go. AASTG is a collection of over 400 Speaker Tapes dating from the present all the way back to the 1930s. In addition to the 400+ free speakers, there are special workshops and presentations that can be purchased from within the app. They are collections from some of the greatest members of all time. Recently I was at the AA World Conference in San Antonio. I spent over $200 on Speaker CDs. This is the best deal around. Take speakers with you wherever you go. Listen in the car, on a plane, train or wherever you feel you need a little inspiration.You must have external Storage on an SD Card for the application to work. It is best to download speakers on a WiFi connection, but not required.

reviews.title: A few issues
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t save the progress between uses which means hunting for the right place to resume from.  Doesn\'t pause when calls come in or notification tones sound.  Should not charge for downloading any content produced and copyright of others or public domain.
reviews.author: Michael Kent

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Working well now. Good way to keep all those recordings in one convenient place.
reviews.author: Andrew Smith

reviews.title: Paid for add on... won\'t download.
reviews.comment: I paid for Scott L. Journey and can\'t download it.  What\'s up with that? I\'d like to listen through the app but would be happy with you just sending me the mp3s.
reviews.author: Ryan DeMarsh

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: OK bright one we all know that the J&C tapes have been freely available from the beginning. I don\'t want it on the net I want it on my phone on the plain at 3,500 feet up.  I also want them easily accessible and that is what this app does.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RIP OFF.  NOT HONEST BUSINESS.
reviews.comment: I bought the AA Speakers App. But then you want additional $$ for speakers at certain conventions, Joe & Charlie etc..  This is NOT HONEST business.
reviews.author: Dave Hunt

reviews.title: stops
reviews.comment: for some reason this app that I\'ve paid for, keeps stopping please fix this or refund my money !!!! I bought the Joe and charlie set and never received it
reviews.author: Jaymz Telford

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Good job on this app. I listen while delivering Chinese food. Keeps me sober and my anxiety lower.
reviews.author: Ambrose Salmini

reviews.comment: Great idea, but after buying I now have trouble listening to any of the speakers. One cut off halfway through & wouldnt replay.  Please advise!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: I like the concept, the segments are only like, 5 minutes long and many fail to download.  Would like my money back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs ICS Fix
reviews.comment: Was great, but no longer works after ICS OTA upgrade. Please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app! Have AA with me all the time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Downloaded a few so far and the quality of the audio was Fantastic! Thank You!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AA anytime anywhere
reviews.comment: This is awesome. I get an instant meeting when I need one. Love the old timers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great app for driving in the car. The only downside is that it needs more speeches.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I LOVE THIS APP! KEEPS ME GOING? THANKS!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aa peace of mind
reviews.comment: Awesome to pick up self
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Well worth it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app! I can listen to talks while at work each day. I usually have to turn my phone off and back on to see new downloads but otherwise is great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is pretty phenomenal. I am excited to listen to these. I found one of my buddy\'s talking on here.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: OMG Bob E. isn\'t even one of the speakers. Uninstall and refund.
reviews.author: A Google User
